alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued July 31 at 5:10AM CDT until August 01 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected. * WHERE...Beaches along Lake Michigan in Door County. * WHEN...From this evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and waves can sweep people off piers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Several beaches that will be most susceptible to the dangerous swimming conditions include... Rock Island State Beach, Baileys Harbor beaches and Whitefish Dunes Beach in Door County.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.
